name: Creatures Reboot
description:
Creatures Reboot is a remake of the original Creatures game now in HTML5.  

The mighty king of the deep has been terrorizing the local population take a stand with your Creatures and neutralize the king.

Creatures

22 unique Creatures can be caught and battled. Each can be found in different locations.

Locations

Each location has a different list of locations which it picks from keeping the game play fun and interesting.
